previewArticle.title: FC Edmonton vs. Montreal Impact | Canadian Championship Match Preview

recapArticle.title: FC  Edmonton 2, Montreal Impact 1 | Canadian Championship Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Attempt missed. Hanson Boakai (FC Edmonton) left footed shot from the left side of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Ritchie Jones.
Tomi Ameobi (FC Edmonton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Hassoun Camara (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Steven Sandor
timelineItems.text: #FCEd with some bad giveaways on their side of half, but Boakai has looked bright early. He's the wild card out there.

timelineItems.name: Bruno LeBlanc
timelineItems.text: Boakai is fast! Wow! #IMFC @FCEdmontonNow

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Pour votre info, Boakai habite Edmonton depuis l'âge de 7 ans #FCEdmonton #imfclive

timelineItems.name: marcom
timelineItems.text: Ouimrtte and Mallace screwing things up and edm get good shot #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Martin Rainville
timelineItems.text: Pas beaucoup de création offensive #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: Klopas s'est impatienté à l'endroit de Bernier. Ne semblait satisfait de sa couverture. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Jack McInerney (Montreal Impact).
Frank Jonke (FC Edmonton) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt saved. Hanson Boakai (FC Edmonton) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Daryl Fordyce.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Brosseau
timelineItems.text: THEM BAGPIPES #FCEdmonton

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Sanna Nyassi (Montreal Impact).
Lance Laing (FC Edmonton) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Ricardo Sobral
timelineItems.text: So close I can hear the players #FCEd vs #IMFC #yeg #VCup

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, FC Edmonton 2, Montreal Impact 1.

timelineItems.name: FC Edmonton
timelineItems.text: The Rally Rabbit strikes in Edmonton. This is #FCEd's first win over MLS competition in their history of the ACC.

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Kareem Moses (FC Edmonton) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Rico
timelineItems.text: Remembering last time we faced #IMFC!! A lot of hate that game maybe our true rival for #FCEd

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Marsolais
timelineItems.text: La marche vers le championnat canadien commence maintenant. Allez Impact!!! #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Will
timelineItems.text: Allez Montreal chant in Edmonton. What. #IMFClive

timelineItems.comment: Hanson Boakai (FC Edmonton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Calum Mallace (Montreal Impact).
Patrice Bernier (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Ritchie Jones (FC Edmonton).
Corner,  FC Edmonton. Conceded by Hassoun Camara.
Hand ball by Jack McInerney (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Sam A
timelineItems.text: After 24 minutes not very impressed with #imfclive come on guys! You are the defending champs, play like champs!

timelineItems.name: FC Edmonton
timelineItems.text: 24'- First corner of the game for #FCEd! Put high and into the box and deflected out. Good chance for the Eddies. 0-0. #FCEvIMFC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Karl Ouimette (Montreal Impact).
Tomi Ameobi (FC Edmonton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
Karl Ouimette (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Frank Jonke (FC Edmonton).

timelineItems.name: Ricardo Sobral
timelineItems.text: Great seats #yeg #FCEd vs #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Tali
timelineItems.text: Where is my Impact and can someone bring them back please #sosad #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Alex Cayer
timelineItems.text: on peut tu juste avoir 3 passes consécutives please ? #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: On ne peut pas dire que #IMFC paraît particulièrement bien dans cette première demi-heure.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Les joueurs sur le terrain n'ont pas joué ensemble cette saison et ça paraît malheureusement #CCA #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Daryl Fordyce (FC Edmonton) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Maxim Tissot (Montreal Impact).
Corner,  FC Edmonton. Conceded by Maxim Tissot.

timelineItems.name: Albert
timelineItems.text: .. What is going on..?! How is ED controlling the game..? HOW? #IMFC #imfclive

timelineItems.name: Olivier Brett
timelineItems.text: Edmonton commence a comprendre que l'axe est congestionné. #IMFC devrait commencer a renverser aussi. #IMFClive

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  FC Edmonton. Conceded by Hassoun Camara.
Corner,  FC Edmonton. Conceded by Collen Warner.
Foul by Neil Hlavaty (FC Edmonton).
Calum Mallace (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Tomi Ameobi.
Frank Jonke (FC Edmonton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Hassoun Camara (Montreal Impact).
Attempt missed. Hanson Boakai (FC Edmonton) left footed shot from long range on the right misses to the left. Assisted by Frank Jonke.
Foul by Hassoun Camara (Montreal Impact).
Tomi Ameobi (FC Edmonton) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Alex
timelineItems.text: Il semble y avoir un beau coucher de soleil à Edmonton. Malheureusement, la caméra est fixée sur le match. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Nilton Jorge
timelineItems.text: Boakai > Gonzalez ? #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: Louis J. Beaulieu
timelineItems.text: Ils prennent tellement de temps a remettre le ballon en jeu a chaque fois. Signe de fatigue? #imfclive

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Calum Mallace (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Patrice Bernier.

timelineItems.name: Martin Rainville
timelineItems.text: le plus intéressant du match #imfc, la cornemuse. C'est tout dire. quel instrument endormant.

timelineItems.comment: Patrice Bernier (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Neil Hlavaty (FC Edmonton).
First Half ends, FC Edmonton 0, Montreal Impact 0.

timelineItems.name: kimberlee
timelineItems.text: Watching FC Edmonton as the sun sets #refereeabuse #fcedmonton

timelineItems.name: Jeff Woodward
timelineItems.text: What a beautiful night for a soccer game. #yeg #fcedmonton.

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins FC Edmonton 0, Montreal Impact 0.
Attempt blocked. Collen Warner (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Attempt missed. Ritchie Jones (FC Edmonton) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the right.
Foul by Hanson Boakai (FC Edmonton).
Heath Pearce (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Quand tu peux entendre ce que disent les coachs sur le banc, c'est parce qu'il manque un peu d'ambiance ! #imfclive #imfc

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Karl Ouimette (Montreal Impact).
Frank Jonke (FC Edmonton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt saved. Blake Smith (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Patrice Bernier.
Jack McInerney (Montreal Impact) hits the bar with a header from the centre of the box.
Foul by Daryl Fordyce (FC Edmonton).
Maxim Tissot (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Blake Smith (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Kareem Moses (FC Edmonton).

timelineItems.name: Carla
timelineItems.text: Ayez peur du lapin! #fcedmonton #amway #soccer #feartherabbit #yeg #montrealimpact

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  FC Edmonton. Conceded by Karl Ouimette.
Daryl Fordyce (FC Edmonton) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Maxim Tissot (Montreal Impact).
Mallan Roberts (FC Edmonton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Calum Mallace (Montreal Impact).
Attempt blocked. Blake Smith (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Collen Warner.

timelineItems.name: Marc-Alexandre P.
timelineItems.text: Hahah tout ce qu'on entend c'est le Allez Montréal en gradin. Parfait. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Maxim Tissot (Montreal Impact).
Hanson Boakai (FC Edmonton) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt blocked. Patrice Bernier (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Calum Mallace.
Offside, Montreal Impact. Maxim Tissot tries a through ball, but Collen Warner is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Bobby
timelineItems.text: Even against this minor-league #Edmonton team, the #IMFC look anemic.. #CDNchampionship #imfclive :(

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Frank Jonke (FC Edmonton) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right.

timelineItems.name: Jason Armstrong
timelineItems.text: Fc Edmonton game with Taylor :) #fcedmonton #montrealimpact #clarkestadium #socceristuff

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Kareem Moses.

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: Je crois que les fans d'Edmonton crient le nom d'Eddie Firmani depuis tantôt. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Lloyd Barker
timelineItems.text: By taking off their best player (Boakai), a confident Edmonton coach feels they've done enough for tonight against #imfclive.

timelineItems.name: Pierre-Alexandre Ca.
timelineItems.text: C'est Montréal ou Edmonton l'équipe de D2? #imfc #imfclive

timelineItems.name: GSharp
timelineItems.text: Huge gap between defense and midfield. #IMFC #imfclive #TSN690

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Hernán Bernardello (Montreal Impact).
Foul by Hernán Bernardello (Montreal Impact).
Ritchie Jones (FC Edmonton) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Mathieu Boursiquot
timelineItems.text: @SoccerSansF Heath Pearce, c'est le Eric Abidal de la MLS. #IMFClive

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Santiago González (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Collen Warner.

timelineItems.name: Shawn Richardson
timelineItems.text: Well, lots of people didn't convince anybody that they deserve playing time tonight. We need new players in the summer. #imfc

timelineItems.name: Guillaume
timelineItems.text: Avoir fait tes changements comme du monde Klopas, t'aurait fait entrer AJH pour essayer de gagner le match #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Daryl Fordyce (FC Edmonton).
Jérémy Gagnon-Laparé (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Roberto Grosso
timelineItems.text: Good to see Klopas giving field time to a U23 Academy player vs FC Edmonton. Every bit of gametime earned builds experience #IMFC #canChamp

timelineItems.name: steve McDonald
timelineItems.text: Je viens de vomir #imfc

timelineItems.name: Shawn Richardson
timelineItems.text: Disaster. 2-1 Edmonton. #imfc

timelineItems.name: Laurent
timelineItems.text: I was just a about to say Ouimette was our best player today.. Ouain.. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Remo Zaccagna
timelineItems.text: That, right there, is the Montreal Impact season in a nutshell. #IMFC #IMFClive

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Jérémy Gagnon-Laparé (Montreal Impact).
Mallan Roberts (FC Edmonton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Alain Marc
timelineItems.text: #IMFClive Désolant et disgracieux. Le boycott s'en vient-il? Aucune cohésion face à une équipe de deuxième division.

timelineItems.name: Erik W.
timelineItems.text: Well, this match shows how little depth the team has. Even the B+ team should be able to walk through a lower division opponent. #IMFCLive

timelineItems.comment: Offside, FC Edmonton. John Smits tries a through ball, but Daryl Fordyce is caught offside.
Hand ball by Neil Hlavaty (FC Edmonton).

timelineItems.name: LFTR
timelineItems.text: On peut blâmer Ouimette pour le but, mais pas pour le manque d'ambition tactique de cette équipe... D'une médiocrité honteuse. #imfclive

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, FC Edmonton 2, Montreal Impact 1.
